Doc: Determines the currency rate that the seller of the equity amounts will apply at each valuation date for converting the respective amounts into a currency that is different from the currency denomination of the underlyer.

Source.Contents:
/#
   Determines the currency rate that the seller of the equity amounts will apply at each valuation date for converting the respective amounts into a currency that is different from the currency denomination of the underlyer.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.Quanto {
  # Specifies a currency conversion rate.
  fxRate : FpML5.confirmation.FxRate?

  # Specifies the methodology (reference source and, optionally, fixing time) to be used for determining a currency conversion rate.
  fxSpotRateSource : FpML5.confirmation.FxSpotRateSource?

}

fxSpotRateSource.Doc: Specifies the methodology (reference source and, optionally, fixing time) to be used for determining a currency conversion rate.
fxSpotRateSource.Name: fxSpotRateSource
